S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-2770: testBlobAfterCommit(....jdbcapi.BlobClob4BlobTest) fails with 'Unexpected SQL state. expected:<XJ[073]> but was:<XJ[215]>'
Changed error message to reflect that XJ215 is used both after free() has been called on a Lob and after the lob's transaction has been committed.
Changed SQL state when locators are invalid from XJ073 to XJ215 on the client driver.
Patch contributed by Øystein Grøvlen.
